rooms.description: Open entrance area with a central corridor to guide the flow as per Vastu principles.
Spacious living area that opens into the courtyard, designed for family gatherings and social interactions.
Dining space adjacent to the living room for ease of serving meals in a traditional setting.
Functional kitchen with modern amenities and proper ventilation following local norms.
Dedicated space for servants, including a small living area and storage.
Two bedrooms on ground floor providing privacy and natural light as per Vastu guidelines.
